document.full_text: someone using casey anthony's family computer before the death of her 2-year-old daughter caylee surfed the web for information on chloroform, neck-breaking and making weapons out of household products, a computer expert testified on wednesday.
document.title: casey anthony's computer used for chloroform search
lines_and_colors: someone using casey anthony's family computer before the death of her 2-year-old daughter caylee surfed the web for information on chloroform, neck-breaking and making weapons out of household products, a computer expert testified on wednesday.
